Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partly grey in section, the interior is encrusted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394723) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394723)
